7180.title: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked

tosdr.case: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked
tosdr.tldr: The privacy policy states: "This service does not track you, HP-67.com does not collect or share personal information, including IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked. Since you never can upload anything to this website (service), "You maintain ownership of your data". There is no need to register. That is our privacy policy in a nutshell."

7184.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

tosdr.case: You have the right to leave this service at any time
tosdr.tldr:
The Terms of Services states "This service does not track you, HP-67.com terms of service: freely surf the site; no need to register; if you download something give credit where credit is due. Since you never can upload anything to this website (service), "You maintain ownership of your data". That is it in a nutshell. "

Since there is no need to register so anyone my leave the site at anytime at their will without any effort beyond them not visiting the site.
